description: We proposed to enlarge existing rear dormer and proposed at 35B Juliette Balcony, and add two skylight windows to each loft bedrooms and additional skylight window to proposed loft staircase for establishing C3 residential single-family house, with all proposed planning drawings and support document at above address for your attention. We obtained planning consent on 06th February 2020 for 35B Brodie Road - Chingford - London E4 7HF with Planning Application Ref No: 193734 Proposed additional skylights windows in each loft bedrooms will provide additional natural light what is currently in not case some part of loft rooms have dark corners with additional skylight windows will be eliminate dark corners. We proposed additional skylight window for staircases so we can provide natural light rather then use electricity and create additional pollutions.
